title: League of Legends Loading screen not loading and other
body:
I am seeing the same issue that I am having around the forums more now where you will get into champion select but as soon as you try to get to the loading screen it shuts down, I have been referring to the post http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/WyLVUBOK-severe-bug-that-can-effect-anybody-by-the-looks-not-the-firewall-bug-urgent-ban-immenent but after "repairing Lol, uninstalling and reinstalling Lol, Uninstalling Avast but still nothing, I have noticed it happened along with no long being able to connect to any chat channels and being unable to see any spectatable games.

HELP!! :(

replies.body: It has fixed itself with the new patch, I hope it never happens again

I would look at closing off any AV you have and turning off your windows Firewall. If that doesn't work I would even suggest changing over your router.

Other than that you could try changing your DNS to 8.8.8.8
